hymn.title: All Scripture is God-breathed
hymn.chords: | C - G/D - | C/E - G/D - | C - F - | C/G - G - | Am - G/B - | C - G - | C - F - | Gsus4 - G7 - | C - F - | C/G - G - | Am - F - | C/G - G7 - | C - - - |

layout.singingstanza: All Scrip -- ture is God- -- breathed And pro -- fit -- a -- ble for teach -- ing, For re -- proof, for cor -- rec -- tion, For in -- struc -- tion in righ -- teous -- ness, That the man of God may be com -- plete, Ful -- ly e -- quipped for ev -- ery good work.

lyrics.stanza: All Scripture is God-breathed And profitable for teaching, For reproof, for correction, For instruction in righteousness, That the man of God may be complete, Fully equipped for every good work.
